result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Gross  #00626933, Marc J.

records.addlTxt: Cash bond returned to COCC office as refused to sign by inmate

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: No contact with MP, no contact with the family or the residence.  No contact with any minor child. Any cash bond posted for Defendant shall be used for fines, costs and restitution pursuant to WI STAT 969.13(5)

4:22 PM Defendant Marc J. Gross  #00626933 appeared by video from New Lisbon Correctional Center.  Attorney Tiffany M. Winter appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls the case. OSPD report on file, PD office continues to search for counsel.  SP Winters ask the court to go forward with the Init  App. Atty Osberg cautions the court of going forward with the Init App.  Court will set for Adj Init App. DE is unsure of his release date at this time,  Court will set bond at this time. 

 State recommends a  $10,000.00 cash bond, no contact with MP, the family or residence, no contact with any minor Child.  The court will impose the cash bond as requested by the State.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 11, 2023 at 11:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on January 11, 2023 at 11:30 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report. To date 123 attempts have been made to obtain counsel.

4:09 PM Defendant Marc J. Gross  #00626933 appeared by video.  Attorney Tiffany M. Winter appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Per the PD office they continue to search for counsel.  SP Winters informs the court that an Init App has not yet been completed, asks the court to set this for INit App.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 21, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
Status conference on September 6, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Status conference on September 6, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Status conference on September 6, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

1:48 PM Defendant Marc J. Gross  #00626933 appeared by video from New Lisbon Correctional Inst.   Attorney Tiffany M. Winter appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. No appointment of counsel as of yet.  Set for Status September 6, 2022 @ 3:45pm. Adj 1:53pm.
Status conference on July 25, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Marc J. Gross

4:10 PM Defendant Marc J. Gross not in court.  Attorney Tiffany M. Winter appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. DE does not appear from New Lisbon Inst. To date no appointment has been made for PD.  SP Winters has contacted the PD office concerning this.  JA will contact the PD office as to appointment of counsel and next court date. Adj 4:12pm.
Initial appearance on May 31, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

2:37 PM Defendant Marc J. Gross appeared by video.  Attorney Tiffany M. Winter appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. DE reports he has been unable to contact the PD office from the Institution, and does not have any money on his books to make a call.  The court will set for Init App to allow time for the court or Prosecutor to contact the PD office.  Set for Init App May 31, 2022 @ 4:00PM.  DE reports he has not received a copy of the CC, DA Winter reports they have faxed the CC multiple times, they will fax that again. Adj 2:42PM
Adjourned initial appearance on May 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

09:01 AM Defendant Marc J. Gross in court.  Tiffany M. Winter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE informs the court he had no idea he had court today or what it is for.  DE is to contact the PD office in Barron for eligibility. DE informs the court it makes app. 21 days for mail to go out from DOC facility.   Adj Init App May 18, 2022 @ 2:30pm.  Adj 9:07am.
Initial appearance on March 30, 2022 at 09:00 am.
